Title: Star Wars/Saigo no Jedai: Tokubetsu Eizou
Description: ['A promotional video for ', Star Wars: The Last Jedi, ', titled ', Star Wars: Saigo no Jedai, " in Japan. The video re-imagines the Star Wars cast in BB-8's cute design and recaps the events of the previous film ", Star Wars: The Force Awakens, ', titled ', Star Wars: Force no Kakusei, ' in Japan.']
